text:
Exceptional Spirit

Raskolnikov watches Sonia, torn by thoughts.  
Her purity shines amidst darkness.  
‘Can she really resist the abyss?’  

---  

Sonia gazes back, anguish in her eyes.  
‘What would become of them?’  
‘Can she still hold on to hope?’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov contemplates Sonia's exceptional resilience amidst her degrading circumstances, questioning whether her purity can withstand the moral decay surrounding her.
